titles.title: All I Once Held Dear (Knowing You Jesus)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All I once held dear, built my life upon, All this world reveres, and wars to own, All I once thought gain I have counted loss, Spent and worthless now, compared to this.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Knowing You, Jesus, Knowing You, there is no greater thing, You’re my all, You’re the best You’re my joy, my righteousness And I love You, Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All my heart’s desire is to know You more To be found in You and known as Yours To possess by faith what I could not earn All-surpassing gift of righteousness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Knowing You, Jesus, Knowing You, there is no greater thing, You’re my all, You’re the best You’re my joy, my righteousness And I love You, Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh to know the power of Your risen life And to know You in Your sufferings To become like You in Your death my Lord So with You to live and never die.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Knowing You, Jesus, Knowing You, there is no greater thing, You’re my all, You’re the best You’re my joy, my righteousness And I love You, Lord.{/lang-eng}
